public class BpelParser

doAction

protected ParserElement doAction(org.w3c.dom.Node n,
                                 int depth,
                                 ParserElement parent)
This does all the real parsing work. Given a parser node it will check the name and build the appropriate operations from there

Overrides:
doAction in class XmlParser
Parameters:
n - Current node to parse
depth - The indentation level we are at, usefull for displaying
parent - The parser element above this one, since we need to add children as we go
Returns:
The ParserElement that was created during the parsing
